title: Amen, We Praise Your Name, O God

lyrics.text:
Masithi: amen siakudumisa.
Masithi: amen siakudumisa.
Masithi: amen bawo,
amen bawo,
amen siakudumisa.

Sing amen: Amen, we praise your name, O God. Sing amen: Amen, we praise your name, O God.
Sing amen: Amen, amen, amen, amen, amen, we praise your name, O God.
